about_the_game:
Piper's PA-38 Tomahawk is a single-engine, two-seat aircraft with a low-wing configuration. It was built from 1978 until 1982 for general aviation users. Originally designed for use as a trainer, it is also used for recreational and cross-country flying. The Tomahawk has a more spacious cabin than some other aircraft in its class, making it more suitable for long flights.

Features

  • HD Textures
  • Superb material shines and reflections
  • Volumetric side view prop effect
  • Dynamic propeller shines effect
  • High quality 3D model and textures
  • Blank texture for creating your own designs
  • 5 HD liveries
